update t_pec_template_element
f_version = #{version,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_template_mirror_no = #{templateMirrorNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=TINYINT},

f_element_code = #{elementCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_element_name = #{elementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

f_local_suggest_value_json = #{localSuggestValueJson,jdbcType=CHAR},

f_modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
